data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Olimpico.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Juventus's area.
In the minute 2, Danilo Cataldi for Lazio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Lazio needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Davide Massa signals a Lazio throw-in in Juventus's half.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Cristiano Ronaldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Juventus.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Davide Massa awards Juventus a goal kick.
Lazio's Joaquin Correa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 12, Juventus pushes forward through Adrien Rabiot, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 15, Goal! Juventus have got their heads in front thanks to a Cristiano Ronaldo strike.
Juan Cuadrado instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 19, Lazio are pushing forward but Joaquin Correa's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 21, Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Davide Massa awards Lazio a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
In the minute 27, Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Lazio's Joaquin Correa gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 32, Juventus to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 34, Cristiano Ronaldo is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Juventus's area.
Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Vedat Muriqi of Lazio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, Juventus have a goal kick.
Free kick Lazio.
Davide Massa awards Juventus a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Juventus in Rome.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 45, Davide Massa will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, Juventus drives forward and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Danilo Cataldi (Lazio) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Juventus push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lazio defence.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rome Juventus attack through Rodrigo Bentancur. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Lazio are coming forward and Adam Marusic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Juventus have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Juventus.
Juventus's Rodrigo Bentancur has been booked in Rome.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Throw-in Juventus.
In the minute 54, Simone Inzaghi is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Wesley Hoedt replacing Stefan Radu.
Manuel Lazzari is replacing Mohamed Fares for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Simone Inzaghi (Lazio) is making a third substitution, with Felipe Caicedo replacing Vedat Muriqi.
In the minute 56, Davide Massa signals a Juventus throw-in in Lazio's half.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
In Rome, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic of Lazio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
In Rome Juventus drive forward through Adrien Rabiot. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Juventus push upfield but Davide Massa quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 59, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
Important block from the Lazio defence as Cristiano Ronaldo fires in a strike for Juventus.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Olimpico.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Juventus drive upfield and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lazio defender.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
Important block from the Juventus defence as Joaquin Correa fires in a strike for Lazio.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Lazio in the half of Juventus.
Lazio are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Rome, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic of Lazio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Paulo Dybala is replacing Cristiano Ronaldo for the away team.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Dejan Kulusevski with Weston McKennie. This is the second substitution made today by Andrea Pirlo.
In the minute 77, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Danilo Cataldi with Jean Akpa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
Andreas Pereira is replacing Luis Alberto for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 78, Jean Akpa (Lazio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Juventus.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Juventus.
Adam Marusic (Lazio) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Davide Massa waits before resuming play because Rodrigo Bentancur for Juventus is still down.
In the minute 83, Rodrigo Bentancur returns to the field for Juventus after picking up a slight injury.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juan Cuadrado for Juventus has been booked by Davide Massa and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Free kick Juventus.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 89, Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a third substitution, with Federico Bernardeschi replacing Alvaro Morata.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
At Stadio Olimpico the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Davide Massa awards Lazio a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
Throw-in Lazio.
That's full-time at Stadio Olimpico. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! Felipe Caicedo levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Joaquin Correa to set up the goal.
